welcome_message_body: Welcome to Patos de Minas, Brazil! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's charming streets, rich history, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this beautiful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Ebimaki Temakeria

restaurants.address: Rua Major Gote, Patos de Minas, MG
